# movies

**Instance Property**

An array containing the fragmented movie objects being minded.

## Declaration

```swift
var movies: [AVFragmentedMovie] { get }
```

## Adding and removing movies

- **add(_:)**: Adds a fragmented movie to the array of movies being minded.
- **remove(_:)**: Removes a fragmented movie from the array of movies being minded.

items.description: Adds a fragmented movie to the array of movies being minded.
items.name: add(_:)

items.description: Removes a fragmented movie from the array of movies being minded.
